title: Neo PAX Sivir and Epic Capsules now live

replies.body: can you get epic capsules without buying them?

Whats the point of having the border on the OG Skin if everyone already knows its rare. Wouldnt it be better putting it on Neo PAX Sivir to show people using that skin that have the original are using Neo PAX Sivir because they want to. All people with PAX Sivir will have the border so having a special border is pointless is what im trying to say.
riot still owes me a skin for 2015 PAX, which they didnt turn up to and announced that AFTER i brought my ticket, i also did the procudure required of me to get the skin as well and got no reply.
